sentences: This item was first addressed by the SBI plenary on 8 December.
It includes the fourth review of the financial mechanism (FCCC/SBI/2009/MISC.10), report of the GEF (FCCC/CP/2009/9) and the special climate change fund.
Zaheer Fakir (South Africa) and Cecilia Lei (Canada) co-chaired a contact group on this issue.
The SBI closing plenary adopted a conclusion and draft COP decisions on these items.
